title: Implementation of Gampaha, Attanagalla and Minuwangoda Integrated Water Supply Scheme with Preferential Buyers Credit from China
decision_details: the proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardene, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to award the above contract for a total price of US $229.5 million as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Review Committee (SCARC), was approved by the Cabinet.
